import React from "react" import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom" const ProductItem = props => { const { product } = props const { id } = useParams() return(

{product.title}

{product.artist}

{product.price} {product.stock > 0 ? ( {product.stock + " Available"} ) : ( Out Of Stock )}
) } export default ProductItem
